identityVerificationMessage: Please help us in verifying your identity by completing the below with your details.
threeSteps: Your payment is just 3 steps away
emailTooltip: Please enter your Email in yourname@example.com

existingUser.PaymentExchangeTxt: Payment Exchange account with these details already exists.
existingUser.accountDetailsTxt: Your payment account details have already been shared with us. No measures shall be required from your side.

privacyPolicyMsg: At U.S. BancorpÂ®, trust has always been the foundation of our relationship with customers. Because you trust us with your financial and other personal information, we respect your privacy and safeguard your information. In order to preserve that trust, the U.S. Bancorp family of financial service providers pledges to protect your privacy by adhering to the practices described below.
termServicesMsg: The U.S. Bank Payment program uses short code 52272 to alert consumers of action needed to receive a pending payment. The consumer should contact the company payer referenced in the message with questions about the payment. Our client privacy policy may be viewed at
termServicesMsg1: contact information may be found at
termServicesMsg2: The consumer may reply to the message with the word HELP to receive additional information, or STOP to be added to our opt-out list. This is a one-time message; no further communication will be sent. The mobile carriers are not liable for delayed or undelivered messages.
